message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Considering its value, I propose a price of $100 for it. This is a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a reasonable cost.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $90 for this product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Given the value you place on the product, I am willing to sell it to you for $95.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to commit to a price of $88 for the product.
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to sell the product to you for $90. This is my final offer.
